Articles.Content:
Wasn't sure what forum to post this on so here it is!:

I have a question that i'd like to have answered ASAP! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Is it OK for me to only extract the B9 Aerospace folder from the winrar file that curseforge gives you?

![m98ExNm.png](http://i.imgur.com/m98ExNm.png)
It should be, given it's updated to 0.90. Click select everything and drop it into your GameData folder. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> It should be, given it's updated to 0.90. Click select everything and drop it into your GameData folder. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I meant just the B9 Aerospace folder in the picture
Still need to know if i'm able to only use the B9 file in the pic alone ;-;

Actually, you need everything in that ZIP archive.

While the B9 Aerospace folder contains all the part you will build crafts with, the other folders are *dependencies* - i.e they contain plugins that would actually make the parts do stuff in the game, and so if you don't have those, your parts simply won't work.

Also, This belongs as a reply in the thread for b9 aerospace, not it's own thread in a completely different subforum

Wait, Crap, does this count as micro-moderating? PLEASE DON'T BAN ME \*runs away crying\*
You will probably need an updated Firespitter dll obtained seperately, given the last umpteen pages in the B9 thread.
